cause.description:
Unnecessary abuse against all animals should not be tolerated. Animals were put on this earth to live just like us and they do not deserve to be killed for money or tortured by people with no hearts. Animals deserve to live and be cared for and we should all strive for this foundation.
Please invite more people to join this cause
1. Harsh punishments for people who abuse their pets
2. Increased fees for game hunting and the prevention of poaching
3. Love your pet as you would another human
4. Stop the testing of drugs on all animals
5. Animals cannot protect themselves against us, it is our duty to protect them
cause.name: Against Cruelty to All Animals
